trends: There have been no other sightings in West Mansfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: {kt}Very odd flight path, abrupt changes in direction, pulsing light not stationary to us aircraft.
divs: Sighting DetailsHaving a bonfire, the brightness of the object, knew it was not an aircraft,was very bright with pulsating light, observed through binoculars, many smaller light anomalies were going to and away from craft. The flight pattern was abrupt and random, not like anything I have seen before. The object was still moving in a random pattern but we got so tired we went on to bed.my feelings are that this was something truly out of this world.
